00015 /*
00016 cutting_depth - The depth of the cut of this operation, which may differ from the depth of the hole as
00017 such. The NC controller will not check if cutting_depth violates the boundaries of
00018 the associated hole feature. If omitted, the total depth of the feature will be drilled.*/
00019 
00020 
00021 class StepNCTooling 
00022 {
00023 public:
00024   StepNCTooling() ;
00025   virtual ~StepNCTooling(){}
00026   virtual HRESULT DeriveParameters(CCannedCycleItems * items, IStepNodePtr pExecutable);
00027   virtual void InitValues(CCannedCycleItems *pItems);
00028   BEGIN_STEP_MAP(StepNCTooling)
00029 
00030     // These build up the tree - these must be in the proper order
00031     ENTRY(_T("Tool"),       Cycle::Executable,  Cycle::Classname, _T("its_operation/its_tool"))
00032     ENTRY(_T("Tooltype"),     Cycle::Executable,  Cycle::Classname, _T("its_operation/its_tool/its_tool_body"))
00033     ENTRYSET(_T("CuttingEdge"),   Cycle::Executable,  Cycle::Classname, _T("its_operation/its_tool/its_cutting_edge"), _T("[-1]"))
00034 
00035     ENTRY(_T("Toolname"),     Cycle::Feature,   Cycle::String,    _T("its_tool/its_id"))
00036     // WHICH ONE?
00037     ENTRY(_T("Toollength"),     Cycle::Operation, Cycle::Length,    _T("its_tool/its_tool_body/dimension/cutting_edge_length"))
00038     //ENTRY(_T("Toollength"),     Cycle::Operation, Cycle::Length,    _T("its_tool/its_cutting_edge[0]/tool_offset_length"))
00039     //ENTRY(_T("Toollength"),   Cycle::Operation, Cycle::Length,    _T("its_tool/overall_assembly_length"))
00040 
00041     ENTRY(_T("Tooldiameter"),   Cycle::Operation, Cycle::Length,    _T("its_tool/its_tool_body/dimension/diameter"))
00042     ENTRYSET(_T("HandOfCut"),   Cycle::Operation, Cycle::String,    _T("its_tool/its_tool_body/hand_of_cut"), _T(".LEFT."))
00043     ENTRYSET(_T("CoolantThruTool"), Cycle::Operation, Cycle::String,    _T("its_tool/its_tool_body/coolant_through_tool"), _T(".F."))
00044     ENTRYSET(_T("TaperAngle"),    Cycle::Operation, Cycle::Angle,   _T("its_tool/its_tool_body/taper_angle"), _T("0.0"))
00045     ENTRY(_T("NumberOfTeeth"),    Cycle::Operation, Cycle::Long,    _T("its_tool/its_tool_body/number_of_teeth"))
00046     ENTRYSET(_T("ToolTopAngle"),  Cycle::Operation, Cycle::Angle,   _T("its_tool/its_tool_body/dimension/tool_top_angle"), _T("0.0"))
00047 
00048 
00049     // Problem is if these aren't filled in properly its junk - make negative and if still negative delete.
00050     ENTRYSET(_T("CuttingEdgeLength"), Cycle::Operation, Cycle::Length,    _T("its_tool/its_tool_body/dimension/cutting_edge_length"), _T("-1"))
00051     ENTRYSET(_T("PilotLength"),     Cycle::Operation, Cycle::Length,    _T("its_tool/its_tool_body/pilot_length"), _T("-1"))
00052     ENTRYSET(_T("ToolCircumferenceAngle"),  Cycle::Operation, Cycle::Angle, _T("its_tool/its_tool_body/dimension/tool_circumference_angle"), _T("-1"))
00053     ENTRYSET(_T("EdgeRadius"),      Cycle::Operation, Cycle::Length,    _T("its_tool/its_tool_body/dimension/edge_radius"), _T("-1"))
00054     ENTRYSET(_T("EdgeCenterVertical"),  Cycle::Operation, Cycle::Length,    _T("its_tool/its_tool_body/dimension/edge_center_vertical"), _T("-1"))
00055     ENTRYSET(_T("EdgeCenterHorizontal"),Cycle::Operation, Cycle::Length,    _T("its_tool/its_tool_body/dimension/edge_center_horizontal"), _T("-1"))
00056     //ENTRY(_T("direction_for_spindle_orientation"),Cycle::Operation, Cycle::Length,    _T("its_tool/direction_for_spindle_orientation"))
00057     //ENTRY(_T("tool_holder_diameter_for_spindle_orientation"),Cycle::Operation,  Cycle::Length,    _T("its_tool/tool_holder_diameter_for_spindle_orientation"))
00058 #if 0
00059 
00060     its_operation/its_tool/its_cutting_edge/its_cutting_edge[0]/tool_offset_length/
00061     its_operation/its_tool/its_cutting_edge/its_cutting_edge[0]/its_material/standard_identifier/
00062     its_operation/its_tool/its_cutting_edge/its_cutting_edge[0]/its_material/material_identifier/
00063     its_operation/its_tool/its_cutting_edge/its_cutting_edge[0]/technological_data/
00064     its_operation/its_tool/its_cutting_edge/its_cutting_edge[0]/expected_tool_life/
00065     /*  The technology defines the technological parameters to be used for
00066     machining (e.g. the spindle speed and the feed of the tool which guarantee expected_tool_life).
00067     */
00068     its_operation/its_tool/its_cutting_edge/its_cutting_edge[0]/its_technology/feedrate/
00069     its_operation/its_tool/its_cutting_edge/its_cutting_edge[0]/its_technology/feedrate_reference/
00070     its_operation/its_tool/its_cutting_edge/its_cutting_edge[0]/its_technology/cutspeed/
00071     its_operation/its_tool/its_cutting_edge/its_cutting_edge[0]/its_technology/spindle/
00072     its_operation/its_tool/its_cutting_edge/its_cutting_edge[0]/its_technology/feedrate_per_tooth/
00073     its_operation/its_tool/its_cutting_edge/its_cutting_edge[0]/its_technology/synchronize_spindle_with_feed/
00074     its_operation/its_tool/its_cutting_edge/its_cutting_edge[0]/its_technology/inhibit_feedrate_override/
00075     its_operation/its_tool/its_cutting_edge/its_cutting_edge[0]/its_technology/inhibit_spindle_override/
00076 #endif
00077 
00078     END_STEP_MAP(StepNCTooling)
00079 
00080     BEGIN_VERIFY_PARAMETER_MAP(StepNCTooling)
00081 
00082     END_VERIFY_PARAMETER_MAP(StepNCTooling)
00083 };
00084 FEATURE_DECLARE_SMARTPOINTER(StepNCTooling);
00085 
00086 inline StepNCTooling::StepNCTooling() 
00087 { 
00088 }
00089 
00090 inline void StepNCTooling::InitValues(CCannedCycleItems *pItems) 
00091 {
00092   // this should go into the table
00093   pItems->SetVariable(_T("HandOfCut"), _T(".LEFT.")) ;
00094   pItems->SetVariable(_T("CoolantThruTool"), _T(".F")) ;
00095   pItems->SetVariable(_T("TaperAngle"), _T("0.0")) ;
00096   pItems->SetVariable(_T("Toolradius"), _T("0.0")) ;
00097   pItems->SetVariable(_T("CuttingEdge"), _T("[-1]")) ;
00098 
00099 }
00100 
00101 inline HRESULT StepNCTooling::DeriveParameters(CCannedCycleItems * pItems, IStepNodePtr pExecutable)
00102 {
00103 
00104   if(pItems->GetValue<double>(_T("Toolradius"), -1)> 0.0)
00105   {
00106     pItems->SetVariable(_T("Tooldiameter"), pItems->GetValue<double>(_T("Toolradius")) * 2.0) ;
00107   }
00108 
00109   if(pItems->GetValue<double>(_T("CuttingEdgeLength"),-1) < 0.0) 
00110     pItems->Remove(_T("CuttingEdgeLength")) ;
00111   if(pItems->GetValue<double>(_T("PilotLength"),-1) < 0.0)
00112     pItems->Remove(_T("PilotLength")) ;
00113   if(pItems->GetValue<double>(_T("ToolCircumferenceAngle"),-1) < 0.0)
00114     pItems->Remove(_T("ToolCircumferenceAngle")) ;
00115   if(pItems->GetValue<double>(_T("EdgeRadius"),-1) < 0.0) 
00116     pItems->Remove(_T("EdgeRadius")) ;
00117   if(pItems->GetValue<double>(_T("EdgeCenterVertical"),-1) < 0.0)
00118     pItems->Remove(_T("EdgeCenterVertical")) ;
00119   if(pItems->GetValue<double>(_T("EdgeCenterHorizontal"),-1) < 0.0)
00120     pItems->Remove(_T("EdgeCenterHorizontal")) ;
00121 
00122 
00123   //Hack for now
00124   pItems->SetVariable(_T("CuttingEdge"),_T("[-1]")) ;
00125   
00126 
00127   return S_OK;
00128 
00129 }
00130 
00131 class StepNCWorkpiece : public  CStepNCItems
00132 {
00133 public:
00134   StepNCWorkpiece() { InitStepItems(&items); }
00135   virtual ~StepNCWorkpiece(){}  
00136   IStepNodePtr _project;
00137   IStepNodePtr _workpiece;
00138 
00139 
00140   void InitValues(CCannedCycleItems *pItems) {}
00141 
00142   inline HRESULT Create(IStepNodePtr project)
00143   {
00144     if (project==NULL)
00145       return E_INVALIDARG;
00146 
00147     _project=project;
00148     INodeListPtr its_elements = _project->GetAttributeNodeList(_bstr_t(L"its_workpieces"));
00149     int n = its_elements->size();
00150     if(n < 1)
00151     {
00152       _workpiece= its_elements->push_back(_bstr_t(L"workpiece"), _bstr_t(L""));
00153     }
00154     else
00155       _workpiece=its_elements->back();
00156   
00157     return S_OK;
00158   }
00159   virtual HRESULT LoadIntoStep() 
00160   { 
00161     CAddons addons(_project);
00162 
00163     for(int i=0; i< this->items.size(); i++)
00164     {
00165       if(items.at(i)->Type() == Cycle::Classname)
00166       {
00167         _project->AddAttribute(bstrFormat(_T("%s%s"), items.at(i)->StepPath(), items.at(i)->_str));
00168       }
00169       else  if(items.at(i)->Type() == Cycle::StepPosition)
00170       {
00171 
00172         addons.DefineAxis2_placement_3d(_project,items.at(i)->StepPath(), items.at(i)->Name());
00173       }
00174     }
00175 
00176     items.Inject( NULL, NULL, NULL);
00177     return S_OK;
00178   }
00179 
00180   BEGIN_STEP_MAP(StepNCWorkpiece)
00181 
00182     // These build up the tree - these must be in the proper order
00183     ENTRY(_T("Form"),     Cycle::Project,   Cycle::Classname,   _T("/its_workpieces[0]/its_bounding_geometry"))
00184     
00185     ENTRY(_T("Name"),     Cycle::Project,   Cycle::Length,      _T("/its_workpieces[0]/its_id"))
00186     ENTRY(_T("X"),        Cycle::Project,   Cycle::Length,      _T("/its_workpieces[0]/its_bounding_geometry/x"))
00187     ENTRY(_T("Y"),        Cycle::Project,   Cycle::Length,      _T("/its_workpieces[0]/its_bounding_geometry/y"))
00188     ENTRY(_T("Z"),        Cycle::Project,   Cycle::Length,      _T("/its_workpieces[0]/its_bounding_geometry/z"))
00189     ENTRY(_T("Position"),   Cycle::Project,   Cycle::StepPosition,  _T("/its_workpieces[0]/its_bounding_geometry/position"))
00190     ENTRY(_T("Location"),   Cycle::Project,   Cycle::Vector,      _T("/its_workpieces[0]/its_bounding_geometry/position/location/coordinates"))
00191   //workpiece->SetAttributeValue(_T("its_material/standard_identifier"), stdId);
00192   //    workpiece->SetAttributeValue(_T("its_material/material_identifier"), materialID);
00193 
00194     END_STEP_MAP(StepNCWorkpiece)
00195 
00196 };
00197

00199 class StepNCHeader : public   CStepNCItems
00200 {
00201 public:
00202   StepNCHeader() { InitStepItems(&items); }
00203   virtual ~StepNCHeader(){} 
00204   IStepNodePtr _project;
00205   IStepNodePtr _workpiece;
00206 
00207 
00208   void InitValues(CCannedCycleItems *pItems) {}
00209 
00210   inline HRESULT Create(IStepNodePtr project)
00211   {
00212   
00213   
00214     return S_OK;
00215   }
00216 
00217   BEGIN_STEP_MAP(StepNCHeader)
00218 
00219     // These build up the tree - these must be in the proper order
00220     ENTRYSET(_T("Type"),      Cycle::Compute,   Cycle::String,      _T(""), _T("Header"))
00221     ENTRYSET(_T("Units"),     Cycle::Compute,   Cycle::String,      _T(""), _T("MM"))
00222     ENTRY(_T("Description"),    Cycle::Header,    Cycle::String,      _T(""))
00223     ENTRY(_T("Name"),       Cycle::Header,    Cycle::String,      _T(""))
00224     ENTRY(_T("Author"),       Cycle::Header,    Cycle::String,      _T(""))
00225     ENTRY(_T("Organization"),   Cycle::Header,    Cycle::String,      _T(""))
00226   END_STEP_MAP(StepNCHeader)
00227 
00228 };
